#settings

= Settings =

  * *URL_WWW*
  * The URL to your media-files.
  * Default: settings.MEDIA_URL + 'uploads/'

  * *URL_ADMIN*
  * The !FileBrowser Admin-URL.
  * Default: /admin/filebrowser/

  * *URL_HOME*
  * The URL to your Admin Index-Site.
  * Default: /admin/

  * *PATH_SERVER*
  * The URL to your Admin Index-Site.
  * Default: /admin/

  * *PATH_FILEBROWSER_MEDIA*
  * The URL to your Admin Index-Site.
  * Default: /admin/

  * *PATH_TINYMCE*
    xxx

  * *EXTENSIONS*
  * The URL to your Admin Index-Site.
  * Default: /admin/

  * *MAX_UPLOAD_SIZE*
  * The URL to your Admin Index-Site.
  * Default: /admin/

  * *THUMB_PREFIX*
  * The URL to your Admin Index-Site.
  * Default: /admin/

  * *THUMBNAIL_SIZE*
  * The URL to your Admin Index-Site.
  * Default: /admin/

  * *IMAGE_GENERATOR_DIRECTORY*
